Tap up to two target creatures. Put a stun counter on one of them. [i](If a permanent with a stun counter would become untapped, remove one from it instead.)[/i]
Flashback {3}{U} [i](You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)[/i]
notes:
